Description: Create a file with our File connector
Name: Generic File

Methods.Name: Create Delimited Text File
Methods.Description: Add Request Fields to this connector to create a delimited text file.  Use the Field Location syntax of "[].FieldName" to build content from a list (or array) of data.

Methods.Name: Read Delimited Text File
Methods.Description: Convert delimited text file to JSON. Add response fields in the Field Location syntax of "[].FieldName" to map the converted data.

Methods.Name: Read XML File
Methods.Description: Convert XML file to JSON. Add response fields in the Field Location syntax of "[].FieldName" to map the converted data. Attributes are prefixed with "@".

Methods.Name: Create XML File
Methods.Description: Add Request Fields to this connector to create an XML file.  Use the Field Location syntax of "[person].name" to build content from a list (or array) of data. Use "[person].@id" to build attributes. Use "[person].#cdata-section" to build character data.
